title: Improving stats in Status Desktop
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*:
It's great to see stats on "Advanced settings" in Status Desktop but there is a few improvements we can do.

#### Expected behavior
1. Mailserver requests stats should be removed. 
2. The presented values should be formatted with a proper unit. JSON-RPC `debug_metrics` call [passes `true`](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/a04952b60c55190f628083a7ffeca3145e6b0fab/src/status_im/ui/components/desktop/events.cljs#L65) as a parameter but passing `false` returns formatted values.
3. Whisper stats should be displayed (`envelopeNewAdded.Overall`, `envelopeSize.Overall`, `envelopeAdded.Overall`).

#### Actual behavior
1. "Mailserver requests" are always 0 because they are related to Mailserver "backend" that collects messages and serves responses.
2. Instead of "p2p traffic > inbound 1.04M (1.04K/s)" I see "p2p traffic > inbound 1042334".
3. Whisper stats are not visible at all.

### Reproduction
- Open Status Desktop (tested on v0.9.0 (c8e5fd6a9)),
- Go to Profile > Advanced settings.

### Solution
*Summary*: 

1. Remove "Mailserver requests" completely,
2. Pass [`false` in `debug_metrics` call](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/a04952b60c55190f628083a7ffeca3145e6b0fab/src/status_im/ui/components/desktop/events.cljs#L65).
3. Add "Whisper envelopes" stats.

### Additional Information
* Status version: v0.9.0 (c8e5fd6a9)
* Operating System: Desktop

### Follow up

Statusgo should provide some stats related to JSON-RPC requests, though. When they are available, we can bring back "Mailserver requests".
